EmailTemplate.description: IN USE email sent to Application Owner that minimum reviews are completed
EmailTemplate.name: Notify Application owner that Minimum reviews are completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Minimum Review has been Completed for the Application #{!Application__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Application {!Application__c.Name} is ready for submission.
Dear {!Application__c.OwnerFullName} ,
This is to inform you that your Application {!Application__c.Name} with Title {!Application__c.Title__c} has been reviewed for minimum number of required reviews and is not eligible to be submitted for Internal Approval .
To access the Application please click here {!Application__c.Link}.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
